name: Darlie
intake: found by a member of the public as a newborn along with 4 of my siblings in Pat Heung on 9 September 2022
aboutMe: Positive, Gentle, Happy, Shy, Lovely, Reserve                I was found by a member of the public as a newborn along with 4 of my siblings in Pat Heung on 9 September 2022. My eyes hadn’t even opened yet. Despite this sad start, I am a happy, positive girl thanks to my foster parents and lead an active life. I enjoy scratches behind the ear and rough-housing with my friends. Will you adopt me and go on some adventures together?
description:

name: Hunter
aboutMe: Positive, Shy, Tireless, Energetic                Woof~ My name is Hunter! When I was only a few days old, I got abandoned on the street. If it wasn’t for the SPCA Inspectors who rescued me, I would not have been able to explore this world. I’m very playful and literally bouncy, as it’s my way to catch people’s attention. If you and I are friends, I won’t hesitate to jump on you and show you my love. I enjoy playing with dogs too, but prefer smaller dogs over large ones. Come play with me at the SPCA Hong Kong
description:
Hunter是一只Mongrel，代码541923，Rescued by Inspectors。

name: Bailey
aboutMe: Enthusiastic, Sociable, Sophisticated, Talkative                Hi, I’m Bailey! I was found with a group of puppies trapped inside a hole in a sawmill in Ma Tso Lung on 14 December 2022.  It took the inspectors nearly 2 hours to rescue us all.  I have been at the SPCA ever since, and all of my siblings have now been adopted.  I am a bit of a sensitive boy and don’t enjoy being in kennels. What looks like aggression is actually kennel stress and fear and no dog should have to be in kennels this long.  I enjoy playing ball games and will need an experienced and patient owner who can give me plenty of mental and physical stimulation. Please ask the staff at the Tsing Yi
description:

name: Nancy
aboutMe: Friendly, Courageous, Sophisticated, Strong                Hi, I’m Nancy. I was found near a fishpond at Mai Po Nature Reserve on 25 April 2022. Although still young, I am a mature and sophisticated lady, and love to be around people and dogs. I am calm, affectionate and very cooperative when it comes to grooming and vet visits. I love my food and am told my face lights up whenever treats come out. Please give me a chance, and take me a home for a happy ever after!
description:
